overview: An intense recording of the profile of a rafterâ€™s daily work in a nook on the edge of the Citarum river brings the camera to explore the corners of a location in an ecosystem. This recording has gradually revealed the picture of a natural and social landscape on that nook. The human social cycle and the natural cycle coexist and establish their poetry about a certain cycle of life in an ecosystem.
title: Di Pinggir Kali Citarum
